amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 409 which extends for one year the deadline for airports to fully utilize explosive detection systems to screen all checked baggage.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 107-615 to strike Sec. 409 of the bill (Extension of Airline Baggage Screening Deadline).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 217 (Roll no. 362).
